abstract: Irene B. Rosenfeld, chief of Kraft Foods, is taking a chance by going against Warren E. Buffett’s objections to the Cadbury deal, Reuters Breakingviews says.
snippet: Irene B. Rosenfeld, chief of Kraft Foods, is taking a chance by going against Warren E. Buffett’s objections to the Cadbury deal, Reuters Breakingviews says.
lead_paragraph: Irene Rosenfeld is clearly feeling lucky, Reuters Breakingviews says. Ms. Rosenfeld, the chief executive of Kraft Foods, raised her price to secure Cadbury’s agreement to a takeover. But in reducing the stock component, she also removed a chance of Warren E. Buffett voting against the deal, the publication notes.

abstract: Oracle Corp won unconditional European Union approval on Thursday for its $7 billion takeover of Sun Microsystems, a month after offering public pledges to sooth regulatory concerns.
snippet: Oracle Corp won unconditional European Union approval on Thursday for its $7 billion takeover of Sun Microsystems, a month after offering public pledges to sooth regulatory concerns.
lead_paragraph: The European Commission said Thursday that it had approved the proposed $7.4 billion takeover of Sun Microsystems by Oracle, the U.S. software giant, because it would not significantly affect competition in the European Union, Matthew Saltmarsh writes in The New York Times.

headline.main: Oracle Wins E.U. Approval for Acquisition of Sun
